Basic Decision Tree Test Data

Source: R/data-documentation.R
basic_decision_data.Rd

A dataset containing basic treatment comparison data for testing the decision tree graph module. This dataset simulates a simple clinical decision between surgery and medical treatment.

Usage

basic_decision_data

Format

A data frame with 100 rows and 13 variables:

patient_id

Patient identifier (1-100)

treatment

Treatment type: Surgery or Medical Treatment

hospital_type

Hospital type: Academic or Community

prob_success_surgery

Probability of success for surgery (0.7-0.9)

prob_success_medical

Probability of success for medical treatment (0.5-0.7)

prob_complications

Probability of complications (0.1-0.3)

prob_recurrence

Probability of disease recurrence (0.2-0.4)

cost_surgery

Cost of surgery in USD (mean: 15,000)

cost_medical

Cost of medical treatment in USD (mean: 8,000)

cost_complications

Cost of managing complications in USD (mean: 5,000)

cost_followup

Follow-up costs in USD (mean: 2,000)

cost_recurrence

Cost of managing recurrence in USD (mean: 12,000)

utility_success

Utility value for successful treatment (0.8-0.95)

utility_failure

Utility value for treatment failure (0.4-0.6)

utility_complications

Utility value with complications (0.3-0.5)

utility_recurrence

Utility value with recurrence (0.2-0.4)

clinical_outcome

Clinical response: Complete/Partial/No Response

adverse_events

Adverse event severity: None/Mild/Moderate/Severe

Source

Simulated data for testing decision tree analysis

Examples

data(basic_decision_data)
head(basic_decision_data)
#> # A tibble: 6 × 18
#>   patient_id treatment   hospital_type prob_success_surgery prob_success_medical
#>        <int> <chr>       <chr>                        <dbl>                <dbl>
#> 1          1 Surgery     Community                    0.877                0.597
#> 2          2 Surgery     Community                    0.803                0.589
#> 3          3 Surgery     Academic                     0.870                0.512
#> 4          4 Surgery     Community                    0.789                0.566
#> 5          5 Medical Tr… Academic                     0.732                0.676
#> 6          6 Medical Tr… Community                    0.788                0.686
#> # ℹ 13 more variables: prob_complications <dbl>, prob_recurrence <dbl>,
#> #   cost_surgery <dbl>, cost_medical <dbl>, cost_complications <dbl>,
#> #   cost_followup <dbl>, cost_recurrence <dbl>, utility_success <dbl>,
#> #   utility_failure <dbl>, utility_complications <dbl>,
#> #   utility_recurrence <dbl>, clinical_outcome <chr>, adverse_events <chr>

# Use in decision tree analysis
# In jamovi: meddecide > Decision > Decision Tree Graph
# Decisions: treatment
# Probabilities: prob_success_surgery, prob_success_medical
# Costs: cost_surgery, cost_medical
# Utilities: utility_success, utility_failure
